12 #ifndef plMatrixDataDescriptor_h
13 #define plMatrixDataDescriptor_h
14 
15 #include "plConfig.h"
16 
17 #include <plDataDescriptor.h>
18 #include <plError.h>

20 #include <plRealType.h>
21 #include <plArray.h>
22 #include <plValues.h>

24 #include <vector>
25 #include <cassert>
26 
30 template <typename T>
31 class plMatrixDataDescriptor :public plDataDescriptor
32 {
33 private:
34  plMatrixDataDescriptor(const plMatrixDataDescriptor&);
35  plMatrixDataDescriptor& operator=(const plMatrixDataDescriptor&);
36 public:
37  //=============================================================================
45  explicit
46  plMatrixDataDescriptor(const std::vector < std::vector<T> > *data,
47  const std::vector < std::vector <bool> > *def=0)
48  : plDataDescriptor()
49  , data_(data)
50  , definition_(def)
51  , current_row_(0)
52  , complete_data_current_row_def_()
53  , variables_()
54  , current_value_()
55  {
56  if(!data){
57  this->is_ok_ = false;
58  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data pointer is null");
59  }
60  unsigned int s = (data_->empty() ? 0 : ((*data_)[0]).size());
61 
62  if(definition_){
63  if(definition_->size() != data_->size())
64  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data matrix and definition matrix must have the same dimension");
65 
66  if(!data_->empty()){
67  if((*definition_)[0].size() != (*data_)[0].size())
68  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data matrix and definition matrix must have the same dimension");
69  }
70  }
71  else {
72  complete_data_current_row_def_ = std::vector<bool>(s, true);
73  }
74 
75  current_value_ = plValues(plArray("X",
76  plRealType(-std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max(), std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max()),
77  1, s));
78  }
79 
80  //=============================================================================
86  plMatrixDataDescriptor(const plVariablesConjunction& variables,
87  const std::vector < std::vector<T> > *data,
88  const std::vector < std::vector <bool> > *def=0)
89  : plDataDescriptor()
90  , data_(data)
91  , definition_(def)
92  , current_row_(0)
93  , complete_data_current_row_def_()
94  , variables_()
95  , current_value_()
96  {
97  if(!data){
98  this->is_ok_ = false;
99  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data pointer is null");
100  }
101 
102  if(!data_->empty()){
103  if(variables.dim() != (*data_)[0].size()){
104  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data matrix and the variables must have the same dimension");
105  }
106  }
107 
108  this->set_variables(variables);
109 
110  if(definition_){
111  if(definition_->size() != data_->size())
112  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data matrix and definition matrix must have the same dimension");
113 
114  if(!data_->empty()){
115  if((*definition_)[0].size() != (*data_)[0].size())
116  throw plError(82, "plMatrixDataDescriptor: data matrix and definition matrix must have the same dimension");
117  }
118  }
119  else {
120  unsigned int s;
121  if(data_->empty()) s = 0;
122  else s = ((*data_)[0]).size();
123  complete_data_current_row_def_ = std::vector<bool>(s, true);
124  }
125  }
126 
127  //=============================================================================
128  void rewind()
129  {
130  current_row_ = 0;
131  }
132 
133  //=============================================================================
134  bool get_data_record(const plValues* &data_values,
135  const std::vector<bool>*& data_definition)
136  {
137  if(!this->is_ok_) {
138  data_values = 0;
139  data_definition = 0;
140  return false;
141  }
142 
143  if(current_row_ < data_->size()) {
144  const std::vector<T> &crow = (*data_)[current_row_];
145  for(unsigned int j = 0; j < crow.size(); ++j) {
146  current_value_[j] = crow[j];
147  }
148 
149  data_values = &current_value_;
150 
151  if(definition_){
152  data_definition = &((*definition_)[current_row_]);
153  }
154  else{
155  data_definition = &complete_data_current_row_def_;
156  }
157 
158  ++current_row_;
159  return true;
160  }
161 
162  data_values = 0;
163  data_definition = 0;
164  return false;
165  }
166 
167  //=============================================================================
168  unsigned int get_num_fields()const
169  {
170  if(!this->is_ok_) return 0;
171 
172  if(data_->empty()) return 0;
173 
174  return ((*data_)[0]).size();
175  }
176 
180  virtual unsigned int get_n_records()
181  {
182  if(!this->is_ok_) return 0;
183 
184  return data_->size();
185  }
186 
194  void set_variables(const plVariablesConjunction &variables)
195  {
196  assert(variables.dim() == get_num_fields() );
197  variables_ = variables;
198  current_value_ = plValues(variables_);
199  }
200 
201  virtual plVariablesConjunction observed_variables()
202  {
203  if(variables_.is_empty())
204  throw plError(115);
205 
206  return variables_;
207  }
208 
209 protected:
210  virtual void Output(std::ostream &os)const
211  {
212  os << "plMatrixDataDescriptor: " << std::endl
213  << " Data records number: " << (data_ ? data_->size() : 0) << std::endl
214  << " Current row: " << current_row_ << std::endl
215  << " Variables: " << variables_;
216  }
217 
218 protected:
219 
220  const std::vector < std::vector<T> > *data_;
221  const std::vector < std::vector <bool> > *definition_;
222  unsigned int current_row_;
223  std::vector<bool> complete_data_current_row_def_;
224  plVariablesConjunction variables_;
225  plValues current_value_;
226 };
227 
228 
229 #endif
